I want to define a new structure as the first problem of this group. As you may know, in the world of problem solving, the main things are structures. Actually I think a real problem solver is who can see structures and work with them.

In this structure we maintain a group of graphs( like trees ), to be covered by some subgraphs. If we can find the structure we can ask some problems like finding minimum number of subgraphs to cover a graph or number of ways to do it.
